title: CIDR Overlap Checker
description: Find overlapping address ranges between two sets of networks

options.title: Options
options.mergeInputsTooltip: Combine overlapping ranges within each set before comparison
options.showOnlyBooleanTooltip: Display just yes/no overlap instead of detailed intersection blocks

input.setATooltip: First set of IP addresses, CIDR blocks, or ranges
input.setBTooltip: Second set of IP addresses, CIDR blocks, or ranges

status.overlapMessage: Sets A and B have overlapping address ranges ({percent}% of smaller set)
status.noOverlapMessage: Sets A and B do not share any common address ranges
